alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Laurens; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 6:09AM EST until January 17 at 1:45AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Dublin affecting Laurens, Wilkinson, Johnson and Washington Counties. For the Oconee River Basin...including Penfield, Milledgeville, Oconee, Oconee, McIntyre, Irwinton, Oconee, Dublin, Mount Vernon... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Oconee River at Dublin. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Minor flooding spreads further into the woodland areas. The water level begins to flood Rex Miller Road... downstream left bank of the Highway 80 bridge. Also Old River Lane...upstream and left bank from the bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 23.5 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 10.2 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 21 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 615 PM EST.
